entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Huntsville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:27 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 6:10 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.3°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -5.5°C
Wind: NE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of snow early this evening. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
